text:
Very delicious! The portion pictured is for $5. The chilli is sourish enough to whet your appetite.

The only downside is that we waited 30 mins for this on a Sunday evening, 13 March 2022. There wasn’t any crowd at first but seems like the orders were taken down and then people went off and came back later. However, this warrants 3 stars due to the small portion for $5! We don’t really eat the oyster but love the flavour full flour and eggs so it’s not worth it. If you’re a fan of big, juicy oysters, then this won’t disappoint! The oysters were really big and juicy!

My mum got the uncle’s number so she can pre-order next time but he don’t give it out to anyone unless you’re a regular.
For 4 dollar cant expect too many oysters, price is okay. Just that its a bit on the oily side. Make it less oily would be great. Chilli is good too
Tried once and I quite like the texture. Quite eggy and last starch type.
This stall of fried oyster is surprisingly nice and awesome. They are price at $4/$5/$8/$10 and you can order according to the size you want. My kids favourite dish.

Best Oyster in this area. Big juicy oyster served with crispy bits and eggs. Must eat with the chili and coriander leaves which makes it even more flavourful. $4/$5 per plate. Opens only in the evenings.
